remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合更改的示例包括添加或删除列。Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑将 替换为 或将消息附加到多行 中。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `DataGridViewColumnCollection1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#372)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#372)]

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: 值的按位组合，表示包含的筛选。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

summary.span: 返回符合给定包含筛选要求的显示序列的第一列。

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中的第一列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示顺序中的第一列是 值最低的列，而不考虑该列在屏幕上是否可见。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法允许您确定符合给定条件的第一列，而不必直接比较索引值。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来交换第一个显示的列和最后显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column. summary.span: 返回符合给定筛选要求的显示序列的最后一列。

span.span: Returns the last column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中的最后一个显示列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

span.span: The last displayed column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示顺序中的最后一列是 值最高的列，而不考虑该列在屏幕上是否可见。The last column in display order is the column with the highest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 利用此方法，您可以确定符合给定条件的最后一列，而不必直接比较索引值。This method lets you determine the last column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来交换最后显示的列和第一个显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the last displayed column and the first displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

span.span: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
